problem.display_name: Graded question - Considerations when Configuring the WHO DQ Tool - Question 2
problem.markdown:
It is important to use data elements with as high reporting rate/completeness as you can when configuring the WHO DQ tool. >>Select the one correct answer: (1 attempt) <<
(x) A. True ( ) B. False [explanation] True is correct [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: It is important to use data elements with as high reporting rate/completeness as you can when configuring the WHO DQ tool.
